:columns-type.description: Option type, an array of 'hour', 'minute', and 'second'
:columns-type.description_zh: 选项类型，由 `hour`、`minute` 和 `second` 组成的数组

min-second.description: The minimum number of seconds that can be selected

max-second.description: The maximum number of seconds that can be selected

min-time.description: The minimum time that can be selected, in the format '07:40:00', 'min-hour', 'min-minute', 'min-second' will not take effect when used
min-time.description_zh: 可选的最小时间，格式参考 `07:40:00`，使用时 `min-hour` `min-minute` `min-second` 不会生效

max-time.description: The maximum time that can be selected is in the format '10:20:00', and 'max-hour', 'max-minute', 'max-second' will not take effect when used
max-time.description_zh: 可选的最大时间，格式参考 `10:20:00`，使用时 `max-hour` `max-minute` `max-second` 不会生效

show-toolbar.description: Whether to display the top bar

loading.description: Whether or not to display the loading status

readonly.description: Whether it is in the read-only state, and the option cannot be switched in the read-only state
readonly.description_zh: 是否为只读状态，只读状态下无法切换选项

:filter.type: (type: string, options: PickerOption[], values: string[]) => PickerOption[]

option-height.description: Option height, support 'px' 'vw' 'vh' 'rem' units, default px
option-height.description_zh: 选项高度，支持 `px` `vw` `vh` `rem` 单位，默认 px

visible-option-num.description: The number of options that are visible

swipe-duration.description: The duration of inertial scrolling during a quick swipe in ms
swipe-duration.description_zh: 快速滑动时惯性滚动的时长，单位 ms

events.name: confirm
events.description: Triggered when the Done button is clicked

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked

slots.name: toolbar
slots.description: Customize the content of the entire top bar
slots.description_zh: 自定义整个顶部栏的内容

slots.name: confirm
slots.description: Customize the content of the confirmation button

slots.name: cancel
slots.description: Customize the content of the cancel button

slots.name: columns-top
slots.description: Customize the content above the options
